caption.p: (6a) A bar plot showing percentage protection of HRBCs by different extracts of Beta vulgaris in comparison to aspirin as standard drug along with their respective error amount as a percentage (6b) A bar plot showing percentage inhibition of hemolysis of HRBCs by different extracts of Beta vulgaris in comparison to aspirin as standard drug along with their respective error amount as a percentage (6c) IC 50 values for log of concentrations of Beta vulgaris extracts for the inhibition of hemolysis of HRBCs along with aspirin as a standard drug.
